mainHero.title: Turn Raw Land Into
mainHero.subtitle: Income Streams
mainHero.description: Stop watching others build their dream income properties. Start building yours! Join our seminar and learn how!

features.title: What to Expect
features.subtitle: Follow in our Footsteps
features.description: Do you dream of your own remote space nestled in nature? Learn how to acquire, permit, build, and maximize profits from raw land. Avoid the mistakes we've made along the way.

items.name: Knowing where to start looking
items.description: A straightforward strategy to identifying your next location

items.description: An approachable way of navigating counties and regulations

items.name: Feeling alone trying to learn all of this
Understanding the numbers

items.description: Action items that bring the biggest return

items.name: Building a real estate portfolio
items.description: A simple, repeatable framework for future investments

itinerary.title: Itinerary
itinerary.description: Meet up at the Railroad Park Resort on Thursday for our morning sessions. Each day we will meet up at different locations throughout the Mount Shasta area. Drinks and snacks are included and meals will be catered by various nearby restaurants. Please let us know of any dietary restrictions. Off-road transportation is available to tour active development site on the last day.

location.title: Location
location.name: Railroad Park Resort
location.subtitle: Join us at the Railroad Park Resort!
location.description: The Railroad Park Resort is an amazing example of turning raw land into one of the most unique experiences in Northern California. Eat on a train, sleep in a caboose, swim in the pool!

options.name: Railroad Park RV or Camp Site
Hotel in Dunsmuir or Mount Shasta
Airbnb in Dunsmuir or Mount Shasta

team.title: The Experts
team.description: Meet our team of talented land hacking experts. Each of us has done this before, made many mistakes, and learned much along the way. Now we want to share everything we've learned with you.
